name: Libre Eau de Parfum Perfume Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Fragrance Family:Floral.Scent Type:Warm Floral.Key Notes:Lavender, Orange Blossom, Musk Accord.Set Description:A two-piece Mother's Day gift set featuring a full- and travel-size Libre Eau de Parfum..About the Fragrance:Celebrate Mother's Day with a bold statement fragrance. This warm floral perfume for women combines French lavender essence with the sensuality of Moroccan orange blossom and daring musk accord for a unique, long-lasting scent..This Set Contains:- 1 oz/ 30 mL Libre Eau de Parfum (full size)
ingredients: Alcohol, Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water, Limonene, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Coumarin, Geraniol, Methyl Anthranilate, Citronellol, Citral, Isoeugenol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Farnesol, Ci 14700/Red 4, Ci 19140/Yellow 5, Ci 60730/Ext. Violet 2.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray perfume on your skin's pulse points: your neck, your wrist, your elbows.

reviews.review_title: Great but not for me ud83dude01
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It was a blind buy so my fault. It's just not for me but the perfume quality is there. It's a beast! I think I will prefer the intense version more ud83dude05 Great set Great perfume just not for me!
